item.title: Imperial Alpha makes history in crude oil trading competition
item.author: Gianpiero Placidi,Bob Xu,Yu (Ronnie) Zhang,Adam Isenberg,Ernesto Ignacio,
item.description: Imperial Alpha, a team of five consisting of members from the Energy Society, won 3rd place in the ESCP Energy Trading Competition 2019. This year, over 40 teams participated in the competition, including a total of seven teams from Imperial College. Imperial Alpha, described by the competition â€¦
